member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_CHANNEL_TYPE
member.summary: Specifies the type of Microsoft Direct3D authenticated channel.

member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_CHANNEL_TYPE.D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_CHANNEL_D3D11
member.summary: Direct3D 11 channel. This channel provides communication with the Direct3D runtime.

member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_CHANNEL_TYPE.D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_CHANNEL_DRIVER_SOFTWARE
member.summary: Software driver channel. This channel provides communication with a driver that implements content protection mechanisms in software.

member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_CHANNEL_TYPE.D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_CHANNEL_DRIVER_HARDWARE
member.summary: Hardware driver channel. This channel provides communication with a driver that implements content protection mechanisms in the GPU hardware.
